item.title: Flight Deck Window Heat Systems – No. 1 (fwd) Windows

remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, one may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions,
Both No. 2 (side) window heaters are operative,
Associated windshield pneumatic anti-fog system is operative, and
Observe EICAS advisory message "L(R) FWD WINDOW".

note.para: No flight in known or forecast icing conditions.

numlitem.para: Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Window Heat System panel "(location) WINDOW HEAT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar affected window heat power C/B:
